level.heading: No new rights or entitlements created; exception.
level.text: No new rights or entitlements are created by this chapter.

level.heading: Temporary Amendment of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 2(eeee) of Self-Sufficiency Promotion Temporary Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Law 12-230, April 20, 1999, law notification 46 DCR 4143).

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 2(eeee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-372, June 9, 1998, 45 DCR 4270), § 2(eeee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Legislative Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-425, July 31, 1998, 45 DCR 5682),§ 2(eeee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1998 (D.C. Act 12-552, December 24, 1998, 46 DCR 521), and § 2(eeee) of the Self-Sufficiency Promotion Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 1999 (D.C. Act 13-19, February 17, 1999, 46 DCR 2492).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-101
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-101, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-241
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 4-201.01.
